Pure Monol for Doodle?!?!?!?!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Pure Monol for Doodle?!?!?!?!
By Da_Mullet on Wednesday, February 11, 2004 - 08:14 pm:

I just tried to get a Scribble with a Messiah, I got him to B, entered in an E tourney, got him down to 45 fame from 97. It didn't work. So I reloaded and tried again. Nada. Is this something overlooked in the Unlock all Breeds FAQ, or by "...Raise a Monol to above 80 fame, then drop it to 65 or lower..." do you mean Monol/Monol? I can't find anything else, Thanks in advance.

By Infernus on Thursday, February 12, 2004 - 02:56 pm:

"...Raise a Monol..."
From what I've seen, in FAQ's where you can use any sub breed of that type as well, it's worded: "...Raise any Monol..."
So, as far as I know, they mean Monol/Monol only.

By Da_Mullet on Thursday, February 12, 2004 - 05:51 pm:

Ok, thanks...Got to find a Monol then...

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, February 12, 2004 - 08:18 pm:

You can always combine your Messiah to make a pure Monol. (or use the CD it came from)

By Bethegus on Thursday, June 16, 2005 - 12:44 pm:

You know, after unlocking Doodle myself, I see why it has to be a pure monol: the Scribble itself looks like a regular Monol with the graffiti on it.

By MJ on Monday, August 1, 2005 - 09:27 pm:

Thats the Idea for getting the doodle I started my game again after a few monthes and am now working on getting the Henger but the doodle comes from the graffiti on the poor monol
